This vignette contains a list of publications that have cited or used the _prioritizr R_ package. It may be useful if you are looking for case studies or examples of specific functionality. We would love to hear from you if you have used the _prioritizr R_ package in your own work. Please [file an issue on GitHub](https://github.com/prioritizr/prioritizr/issues/new) so we can add your work to this list.
